title: Araya chat doesn't work on araya-chat.html
fix_description: NOT A CODE BUG - Configuration/deployment issue. Local araya-chat.html requires either: 1) Netlify deployment with ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, or 2) Local server on port 8002. WORKAROUND: Use external Araya chat already integrated in index.html via 'Chat with Araya' action card (https://6900eed7f2455b1690e62836--verdant-tulumba-fa2a5a.netlify.app/).

technical_details.issue: araya-chat.html calls /.netlify/functions/araya-chat which requires Anthropic SDK and API key
requirements: Netlify deployment with ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable
OR local Araya Computer Control server on port 8002
technical_details.workaround: External Araya chat link already available in index.html at line 317

recommendation: Add deployment instructions or fallback message to araya-chat.html explaining how to use the external Araya chat
